T02D1987:183a-1: badzra pa da bi bhe da n'a ma /
T02D1987:183a-3: rdo rje'i tshig rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba /
T02D1987:183a-4: gang zhig khro ba las rgyal legs pa du ma 'byung ba'i gnas //
T02D1987:183a-5: du: kha che 'joms bde ba rab rgyas bde chen ma he'i zhal //
T02D1987:183a-6: chags las rnam rgyal chags bral rab 'joms mtshan ma legs bsgrengs pa'i //
T02D1987:183a-7: bcom ldan 'jigs mdzad he ru ka la kun nas gus phyag 'tshal //
T02D1987:183a-8: gang zhig khams kyi snying po bde ba 'dzin byed
T02D1987:183a-9: dge slong chen po yin phyir dam tshig sdom pas
T02D1987:183a-10: brgyan // rgas pa'i 'jigs bral rnam par mdzes ldan
T02D1987:183a-11: gzugs bzang dri med gzi 'od rab rgyas yun ring
T02D1987:183a-12: brgyan // bde bar 'tsho // rdo rje'i sku thob
T02D1987:183a-13: mtshan dpes rab brgyan lha dang lha min gnod spyi
T02D1987:183a-14: gdengs ka mkha' 'gro dbang du bsdu //
T02D1987:183a-15: rgyal ba'i thugs mthong dmyal ba'i 'jigs 'joms de yi
T02D1987:183a-16: mdun na rdo rje 'chang gnas gshin rje'i grong las
T02D1987:183a-17: ring // byang chub sems nyams mkha' 'gro'i grong khyer
T02D1987:183a-18: bye pa 'jigs 'gyur lha dang bla ma sgrub la
T02D1987:183a-19: ring // spyan mi blta // bde ba spangs phyir
T02D1987:183a-20: tshul khrims 'chal gyur dam tshig las 'das thub dbang
T02D1987:183a-21: bslus pas dmyal ba'i du: kha myong //
T02D1987:183a-22: gzi 'od rab zad rgyud las nyer gzir phrin las
T02D1987:183a-23: nyams shing dngos grub ring gyur rgas dang 'chi bas
T02D1987:183a-24: 'joms // ltung ba'i bde bas ye shes mi mthong
T02D1987:183a-25: 'dod chags dbang gyur rnal 'byor lam min tshe 'dir
T02D1987:183a-26: 'bras bu 'gag / so so'i skye bo nyams phyir
T02D1987:183a-27: 'bras chang zag dang don med tshangs spyod skams gyur
T02D1987:183b-1: rnal 'byor thabs dang ldan pa'i thig le don ldan
T02D1987:183b-2: 'gyur te mdzangs pa'i nor yin yon tan rab tu
T02D1987:183b-3: 'phel // sbyor lam la ni yun rings 'bad kyang
T02D1987:183b-4: skad cig gis nyams lo zla'i 'bras bu ser bas
T02D1987:183b-5: 'phel // 'joms pa ltar // rdzas dang lam kha
T02D1987:183b-6: kha zas 'khrul 'khor rlung dang dmigs pas rang lus
T02D1987:183b-8: tshad med snying rje rab rgyas skyabs 'gro sems bskyed
T02D1987:183b-9: rgya chen sems dpa' gsum ldan sngon du sto bar
T02D1987:183b-10: sgom // rkang pa rdo rje skyil krung lag gnyis
T02D1987:183b-11: mnyam gzhag lus bsrang mgrin pa dgug cing dpung mgo
T02D1987:183b-12: sgom // legs par brkyang // sna rtser mig gtad
T02D1987:183b-13: phyir la rlung bud nang du bsdu dang bskyar te
T02D1987:183b-14: dgang zhing mjug tu gyen la 'phang ro rkyang //
T02D1987:183b-15: mi phyed phra gzugs brtan 'dzin rtog med gang ba'i dbus der 'bar ba'i aa thung la sel bya //
T02D1987:183b-16: me dang nyi ma lan tshva spangs la mthun pa'i
T02D1987:183b-17: zas brten thog mar rang lus bsgom bya dge ba
T02D1987:183b-18: bsngo ; / tsha zhing gzer zug 'thems 'chus lhags
T02D1987:183b-19: pas lus dang rtsa yin stong dang bug pa rlung
T02D1987:183b-21: nam mkhar sdigs mdzub rdo rje rol pa seng ge
T02D1987:183b-22: rnam grol brkyang bskum rol stabs ri bong gyad 'dzin
T02D1987:183b-23: dang // ka ra na te 'khrul 'khor 'di drug
T02D1987:183b-24: mdun rgyab g-yas g-yon rdo rje gar bya drag po'i
T02D1987:183b-25: dang // rlung gi bu // steng dang 'og tu
T02D1987:183b-26: blta zhing 'dug ste brtson pas 'bad na rtsa yi
T02D1987:183b-27: stobs rgyas lus kyi nad rnams 'joms //
T02D1987:183b-28: dbug rngam rgod 'gag bzlog 'tshub gtor ba rlung dang
T02D1987:183b-29: ngag ste g-yas g-yon mdun rgyab steng 'og bug pa
T02D1987:183b-30: sgom // stag mo'i skyug stangs sprul gyi bya ba
T02D1987:183b-31: bsnyengs dang rgod kyi lding thabs ri bong mchog 'gros
T02D1987:183b-33: seng ge'i sprug stangs 'khrul 'khor 'di drug ha rings
T02D1987:183b-34: hi thung h'um zhes drag pa'i rlung dang bcas te
T02D1987:183b-35: bu // des ni bzlog 'tshub gtor ba'i skyon spong
T02D1987:183b-36: rlung gi stobs rgyas ngag gi nad rnams 'joms par
T02D1987:183b-37: bu // byed ; /'byongs 'dus ltengs pa yid kyi
T02D1987:183b-38: skyon ni nyams shing skam gyur chag dang zug rdu
T02D1987:183b-40: sems ni bsdus phyir h'um gyur slar zhugs dbu mar
T02D1987:183b-41: thim ste gsang zhing 'phang bya gang 'dod yid la
T02D1987:184a-0: bsam // gu gul yungs kar thal chen gri khrag dug dang rus pa @184a * //
T02D1987:184a-1: sprang mar gcan gzan pags pa tsha ba gsum //
T02D1987:184a-2: 'khrul 'khor drug dang rdzas sngags dmigs pa gzung bzlog
T02D1987:184a-3: dgram ste thig le'i stobs rgyas yid kyi nad rnams
T02D1987:184a-4: 'joms // me phreng sdong po gtsub shing 'khor lo
T02D1987:184a-5: sum 'gyur kun khyab me yi dkyil 'khor drod kyi
T02D1987:184a-7: yis me yi mda' 'phangs ham gi 'ben bcom lte
T02D1987:184a-9: steng 'og rlung gi 'khor lo kha sbyor 'og ma
T02D1987:184a-10: 'byed 'dzum yid kyi rig ma bde stong bogs su
T02D1987:184a-11: 'gyur // padma'i phreng ba til gyi mar me mthing
T02D1987:184a-12: gi rgya mtsho rlung gi pa dan gsal ba'i bogs
T02D1987:184a-14: rigs lnga'i 'khor lo gsang ba'i rdo rje zhi bas
T02D1987:184a-15: gsor te dkar bsil ri bong dbab //
T02D1987:184a-16: 'og rlung 'then zhing sgo gcig bsdams te gling bzhi
T02D1987:184a-17: bsdus nas rig byed sor mos lam gnyis mtshams su
T02D1987:184a-18: mnan // yid kyi phyag rgya yid 'ong la sems
T02D1987:184a-19: snyoms 'jug ting 'dzin g-yos pas bde stong dga' ba
T02D1987:184a-20: mnan // dang po'o // mchog gi gnyen po rtsol
T02D1987:184a-21: ba dor la dbang po bzlog cing lam gcig gling
T02D1987:184a-22: bzhi rtsol med mgrin pa dgug / steng dang 'og
T02D1987:184a-23: la rlung la 'dor len bya zhing chags pas mi
T02D1987:184a-24: 'phrogs ting nge 'dzin ro myang ham la gtad //
T02D1987:184a-25: rdo rje khu tshur gling bzhi bsdu zhing ngan 'gro'i
T02D1987:184a-26: lam dag rgya mtsho ri rab la sbyar lhun po
T02D1987:184a-27: dgug / ro 'dzin nyi zla steng phyogs thur sel
T02D1987:184a-28: gyen la 'dren cing sems dang theg le nam mkha'i
T02D1987:184a-29: dbus su gtad // lha dbang lhun po glang po
T02D1987:184a-30: snar 'dzin rnam 'gying rol pa rdo rje gtsug tor
T02D1987:184a-32: rtse gsum gdengs ka 'di drug hi ka dang h'um
T02D1987:184a-33: gyis steng 'og rlung gzung drag tu 'then pas bdun
T02D1987:184a-34: gyis 'drongs // sprugs pa gar dang seng ge rnam
T02D1987:184a-35: rol rnam 'gying gzhon nu kun spyod lha mo'i rol
T02D1987:184a-36: gyis 'drongs // stabs kyis // ldang dang 'dug cing
T02D1987:184a-37: thams cad bskyod pas sna tshogs lus sprug rab tu
T02D1987:184a-38: gsig cing skyil krung gdan la 'phags //
T02D1987:184a-39: rlung dang bcas pas ro stod ro smad mgo dang
T02D1987:184a-40: dbang po yan lag bzhi ste gang 'dod rnams su
T02D1987:184a-41: dgram // thig le kun khyab ye shes bde chen
T02D1987:184a-42: ros gang bsgoms pas bzhi pa'i dga' ba rdo rje
T02D1987:184a-44: theg chen rigs gyur gsang sngags la mos bla ma
T02D1987:184b-1: dang po'i don du rnam bdun dbang sbyin mchog dbang
T02D1987:184b-2: bskur la slob ma smin byas skal ldan nyid du
T02D1987:184b-3: sgrubs // bla ma la gus blo bzang lang tsho
T02D1987:184b-4: brtson bcas gyur na gdams pa mchog sbyin dam tshig
T02D1987:184b-5: sgrubs // don du bstan // rnal 'byor rtog bral
T02D1987:184b-6: dkar po mi nyams ting 'dzin rgyas byed kun mkhyen
T02D1987:184b-7: thob phyir thabs dang ldan pas bya //
T02D1987:184b-8: gang zhig dkar po mi 'dor rnal 'byor bas ni rgyal pa'i bde ba sgrub cing pho nya'i lam //
T02D1987:184b-9: dpal ldan 'dus pa ma lus rgyud du thub dbang
T02D1987:184b-10: rnams kyis yang dag lam du thabs 'di legs par
T02D1987:184b-11: gsungs // sgrub po lang tshos lus dang rtsa bzangs
T02D1987:184b-12: brtson bcas blo gros bzang ldan dbang gis rnam par
T02D1987:184b-13: gsungs // smin // gsum pa'i dbang thob sngags dang
T02D1987:184b-14: rgyud kyi pha rol son cing bla ma'i lung gis
T02D1987:184b-16: dbang gi ye shes mngon du byas te rtsa dang
T02D1987:184b-17: rlung 'byongs thig le la dbang gnyen po 'dzin nus
T02D1987:184b-18: shing // dbang dang dkyil 'khor lha sngags rdzogs rim
T02D1987:184b-19: thabs lam mthar phyin sems nyid nges rtogs sa bcu
T02D1987:184b-20: shing // mngon du 'gyur // dpal ldan rgyud mchog
T02D1987:184b-21: rgya chen bla ma'i man ngag rab zab rnams las
T02D1987:184b-22: dri med bdud rtsi'i bcud babs pas //
T02D1987:184b-23: thabs lam man ngag rdo rje'i tshig 'byed me tog
T02D1987:184b-24: phreng 'dzin sbas pa'i gnad 'di don yod rdo rjes
T02D1987:184b-25: phye // de yi dge ba mtha' yas rgya chen
T02D1987:184b-26: mi nyung des ni bde chen dbus su lhan cig
T02D1987:184b-27: skyes pas rab tu 'khyud gyur cig /'gro ba kun
T02D1987:184b-28: gyi bskal pa'i lam chen tshe 'dir bgrod de rdo
T02D1987:184b-29: rje 'chang dbang sngon du byed par shog / rgyud
T02D1987:184b-30: dang man ngag thams cad kyi don phyogs gcig tu
T02D1987:184b-31: bsdebs mtshan ma gyen 'greng thig le'i 'khrul 'khor gyi
T02D1987:184b-32: man ngag / rdo rje'i tshig rnam par dbye ba
T02D1987:184b-33: phye // zhes bya ba / rgya gar shar phyogs
